CustomField.description: Enables "Where is this used?" feature. Consumes Tooling API limits when searching Flows.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ⚠️ API Limits: Searching Apex classes (free) + Flows (consumes Tooling API calls). Enable only if needed. Each search may use 1-5 API calls depending on org size.
CustomField.label: Enable Usage Tracking
